meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lydia Brawner Ben Pirie Jacob Silverman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6364.

td.p: Lydia Brawner, a performance artist from Oakland, California
Ben Pirie, a recent law school graduate from Portland, Oregon
Jacob Silverman, an arts and culture journalist from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,799)

tr.td: HOW'D THEY DIE?
THE GREAT LAKES
MEN
RUNNING A MARATHON
"PACE" YOURSELF
